snippet.title: Party Hard: The After Party Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing 7 new parties, including zombie invasions, sinking boats, and.... mushrooms-fueled alien invasion? I don't even know anymore. This is Party Hard's After Party Update. 

Get Party Hard on Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/356570 

It's free for everyone who owns Party Hard, because we don't believe in charging players additional money for DLC. 

Party Hard so far...

It's 3AM. Your neighbors are having a loud party. You need to stop it by any means. Welcome to Party Hard, the silly mass murder game by tinyBuild and Pinokl Games. Now with even more zombies and alien butts that shoot rainbows! 

- 19 parties
- 5 playable characters
- twitch chat integration - play with your audience

Playable characters:

- The guy who wants to get some sleep
- The ninja who is fast, stealthy, and shouldn't be seen
- The girl who can knock people out
- The cop who can carry around bodies without suspicion, and blend in
- The butcher who has a chainsaw. Enough said.
